title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SmartReplyMetrics
name: SmartReplyMetrics
description:
The evaluation metrics for smart reply model.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SmartReplyMetrics

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.allowlist_coverage
params.description: Percentage of target participant messages in the evaluation dataset for which similar messages have appeared at least once in the allowlist. Should be [0, 1].

params.name: data.top_n_metrics
params.description: Metrics of top n smart replies, sorted by [TopNMetric.n][].

params.name: data.conversation_count
params.description: Total number of conversations used to generate this metric.
